Package com.bytedesk.social.instagram

Class InstagramProductTemplateController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.social.instagram.InstagramProductTemplateController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/instagram/product-template") public class InstagramProductTemplateController extends Object
Instagram商品模板API控制器 Product Template Controller for Instagram Messaging https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/instagram/features/product-template
